There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south.

infos.name: bar
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a bar. An ordinary one. You try to gain information on your surroundings by using a technique you call 'looking.'



There is an unblocked exit to the south.

objective: Get ready to pick stuff up and put it in places, because you've just entered TextWorld! Here is your task for today. Your first objective is to head north. With that accomplished, go to the north. Then, make an effort to go north. Then, travel east. And then, make an effort to move north. Once you succeed at that, go to the north. With that accomplished, pick up the coin from the floor of the bar. And if you do that, you're the winner!
